contents.text: Welcome to Weebly in San Francisco, where we help you launch and grow your business every step of the way.
For Sales and new account inquiries, please press 1.
For website plans and pricing details, please press 1.
All of our pricing experts are currently busy. Please hold, and we will connect you to Sales as soon as possible.

navigationGoals: Compare website plan pricing options for a new Weebly account
I’m exploring Weebly’s website plan pricing to launch my new business.
Compare monthly vs annual subscription tiers and feature limits for a new Weebly site
I need to find out how much your basic website plan costs.
I want to compare monthly and annual pricing for deploying a personal website to share my physics research notes.

contents.text: For assistance setting up your first store or site, please press 2.
Thank you for your patience. An onboarding specialist will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Get step-by-step assistance setting up my first Weebly site
I need help setting up my first online store with Weebly.
Get step-by-step guidance on deploying a custom domain and configuring DNS for my first Weebly store
I’d like step-by-step help setting up my very first online store.
I need help setting up my first online store to sell physics-themed T-shirts for our student society.

contents.text: For Customer Support and account services, please press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, please press 1.
All of our support agents are assisting other customers. Please hold, and we will connect you to technical support as soon as possible.

navigationGoals: Quickly resolve a technical issue with my existing Weebly site
My Weebly site isn’t loading correctly and I need technical support.
Troubleshoot JavaScript integration error when embedding a third-party analytics widget on my site
I’m having trouble getting images to upload on my site and need technical assistance.
I'm running into an error uploading LaTeX-formatted equations on my site—please connect me to technical support.

contents.text: For billing and payment inquiries, please press 2.
Our billing specialists are busy right now. Please stay on the line, and we will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Clarify a billing charge and update my payment information
I need to update my billing details and review my last invoice.
Investigate and dispute an unexpected charge on my Weebly subscription invoice
I need to update the credit card information on my billing account.
I'd like to review last month's billing charges and update the credit card on file.
